message.empty: ĺ_Are you sure you want to delete this folder, ${title}_________________________________________________ľ?
message.mustBeEmpty: ĺ_The folder ${title} must be empty in order to be deleted___________________________________________________ľ.
message.aFewCannotBeDeleted: ĺ_A few items cannot be deleted. Are you sure you want to proceed with deleting the rest_____________________________________________ľ?
message.mustBeEmptyProceed: ĺ_The folder ${title} must be empty in order to be deleted. Are you sure you want to proceed with deleting these items_________________________________________________________________________________ľ?
message.cannotBeDeleted: ĺ_The folder ${title} cannot be deleted because its items cannot be deleted___________________________________________________________ľ.
